activities:
Data transferred to DBM and/or its US based operations from DBM operations in the EU may be used for a number of purposes, including:
(1) providing career transition and development services to individuals
(2) providing employee benefits and services for employees
(3) providing human resources related consulting services to customers
(4) processing data for compliance with laws and regulations
(5) processing for purposes expressly consented to by the data subject
Data is collected and may be transferred to or stored in the US in support of the company's career related services, regulatory, marketing, sales, financial, legal and other business-related activities.  DBM does not sell personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
